text.div:
Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

CodeURITypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0273 defines the following codes in a Is-A heirarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
AV Available for patient careAvailable for patient careVerfügbar (Kann zur Behandlung herangezogen werden.)
CA DeletedDeletedGelöscht
OB ObsoleteObsoleteNicht mehr relevant
UN Unavailable for patient careUnavailable for patient careNicht verfügbar (Kann nicht zur Behandlung verwendet werden.)

name: DocumentAvailabilityStatus
title: documentAvailabilityStatus
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to define whether a patient document is appropriate or available for use in patient care.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the TXA segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0273 (Document Availability Status)
copyright: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright ©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

designation.value: Nicht verfügbar (Kann nicht zur Behandlung verwendet werden.)
